St._Petersburg.West and East Lealman, Florida: West and East Lealman, more commonly known collectively as Lealman, was a census-designated place (CDP) in Pinellas County, Florida, United States. The population was 21,753 at the 2000 census. For the 2010 census, the area was split into two separate CDPs, Lealman and West Lealman.
